title: Lunchbox Wants to Give Rouge Speech At Wedding + What Our Personal ‘Warning Labels’ Would Be + Callers Who Had Too Much To Drink At Their Wedding
itunes:title: Lunchbox Wants to Give Rouge Speech At Wedding + What Our Personal ‘Warning Labels’ Would Be + Callers Who Had Too Much To Drink At Their Wedding
description:
Lunchbox is going to his cousin’s wedding this weekend and wants to know if it’s okay to give a speech even though he’s not the best man. Bobby made a list of what everyone’s ‘warning label’ would say if they came with one.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
